problem.title: The Problem
problem.text: Today, e-Show connects supply and demand in-person. When the lights go off, bureaucratic friction (compliance, validation, paperwork) slows down deal closings.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.text: Implement a Proprietary Node in ProcureData (based on Pontus-X / Gaia-X). We turn e-Show into the first organizer offering Sovereign Data Infrastructure.

narrative.p1: For years, our mission has been to bring people together. Uniting supply and demand under one roof to spark business opportunities.
narrative.p2: But we know that when the pavilion lights go off, the real obstacle course begins: bureaucracy, supplier validation, audits, and information silos.
narrative.p3: Today, CloserStill takes its most ambitious leap in history. We no longer just organize events; we orchestrate ecosystems.

useCases.title: CloserStill
useCases.subtitle: 5 High-Value Use Cases to monetize your position as an "industry connector" using Federated Data Space technology

1.name: Express Business Passport
1.problem: An exhibitor gets 200 leads at the trade show. 80% go cold because, after the event, the tedious process of legal documentation exchange, NDAs, and supplier validation (Onboarding) begins, lasting weeks.
solution: The visitor's and exhibitor's 'Badge' is not just a contact QR, it's an Identity Wallet (DID).
When there's a 'match', a smart contract (ODRL) is activated allowing the buyer temporary access to the seller's qualification folder.
Available data: ISO Certificates, Solvency, Tax Data, Compliance.
1.value: Sell a 'Premium Exhibitor' package that includes this prior validation. The exhibitor leaves the trade show with suppliers already qualified in their potential clients' systems.
1.impact: From weeks of onboarding to minutes of validation

2.name: Market Intelligence Marketplace
2.feria: Technology for Marketing (TFM) / Big Data & AI World
2.problem: Companies pay fortunes to consultancies (Gartner, Forrester) for trend reports that are usually survey data and opinions.
solution: CloserStill has real behavioral data: Which booths do CPOs visit? What categories do CTOs search for?
An anonymized Data Product is created where exhibitors can contribute their own sales trend data (without revealing clients) in exchange for tokens or discounts.
Compute-to-Data technology is used: Analysis algorithms run on the data without it leaving each company's sovereignty.
2.value: Sell 'Real-Time Market Intelligence' reports based on actual sector transactional data, not surveys.
2.impact: New revenue stream based on data monetization

3.name: End-to-End Pharmaceutical Traceability
3.problem: The pharmaceutical industry has critical regulations (like the anti-counterfeiting directive). Verifying a new packaging or raw material supplier's supply chain at the trade show is complex.
solution: Create a secure channel in the Data Space for serialization and quality verification.
A laboratory can verify at a logistics supplier's booth if they comply with GDP (Good Distribution Practice) standards.
Real-time data node query, with immutable Blockchain traceability.
3.value: Positions Infarma not just as a congress, but as a regulatory compliance hub.
3.impact: Unique differentiation in the pharma sector

4.name: The Verified 'Green Badge'
4.problem: Large corporations (VIP visitors) have strict mandates to reduce Scope 3 emissions (supply chain). They need to contract sustainable suppliers but distrust 'Greenwashing'.
solution: Exhibitors upload their Carbon Footprint data and energy certifications to their ProcureData node.
CloserStill offers visitors a 'Sustainable Scouting' app: Filter exhibitors with audited and digitally signed emissions data.
Verification based on real data, not declarations.
4.value: Attracts large corporate buyers who need to justify green purchases to their shareholders.

5.name: 'Blind' Private Matchmaking
5.problem: In high-level meetings, companies sometimes don't want to reveal their strategic needs unless there's a perfect match. 'I'm looking for a cybersecurity solution for a 500k budget, but I don't want the market to know I have that vulnerability'.
solution: Blind Matching: The buyer posts their need in the data space in encrypted form.
Suppliers post their capabilities without knowing the buyer.
ProcureData's algorithm matches supply and demand without revealing the buyer's identity until there's a 'match' of technical capabilities and budget.
5.value: Elevates eForums quality, guaranteeing absolute confidentiality and high relevance in meetings.

hero.title: CloserStill Media
hero.subtitle: Global leader in professional trade shows and B2B events organization. Driving force behind the Digital Commerce Data Space in Spain.

profile.title: Corporate Profile
profile.p1: CloserStill Media is the global leader in professional trade shows and B2B events organization. In Spain, it manages the most powerful networking ecosystem in the market, connecting supply and demand through "umbrella event" strategies that bring together C-Level executives from multiple verticals under one roof.
profile.p2: Its focus spans from critical technology infrastructure to digital retail and the pharmaceutical sector, acting as the main driver of in-person business in Madrid and Barcelona.
